doc.title: Janet in Jeopardy
doc.plot: Two story lines in this bondage film. In the first Janet's boyfriend discovers that she lied to him: she doesn't have a nice office job after all - she works at a strip club. He catches her leaving her house with a long coat hiding her skimpy maids costume. He forces her back into the house, binds and gags her and then demands she model her fetish costumes for him, while roped and muzzled. In the second story line, Janet is unimpressed by the damsels-in-distress she sees on television. She tells her boyfriend that she could easily escape from captivity. Her boyfriend bets her $100 she can't and Janet soon finds herself in restrictive bondage.
